annotations.description: Deployment template for a django server connected to a PostGreSQL database.
Defines how to deploy the application server

parameters.name: NAME
parameters.description: The name assigned to all of the OpenShift resources associated to the server instance.

parameters.name: SUFFIX
parameters.description: A name suffix used for all objects

parameters.name: APP_NAME
parameters.description: Used to group components together in the OpenShift console.

parameters.name: APP_GROUP
parameters.description: The name assigned to all of the deployments in this project.

parameters.name: IMAGE_NAMESPACE
parameters.description: The namespace of the OpenShift project containing the imagestream for the application.

parameters.name: DATABASE_SERVICE_NAME
parameters.description: The name of the database server/service.

parameters.name: DATABASE_ENGINE
parameters.description: Database engine: postgresql, mysql, or sqlite (default).

parameters.name: DATABASE_NAME
parameters.description: Name of the deployed database (see environment variables in deployed database).

parameters.name: APP_FILE
parameters.description: Used to run the application from a Python script. This should be a path to a Python file (defaults to app.py unless set to null) that will be passed to the Python interpreter to start the application (optional).

parameters.name: APP_CONFIG
parameters.description: Relative path to Gunicorn configuration file (optional).

parameters.name: DJANGO_SECRET_KEY
parameters.description: Set this to a long random string.

parameters.name: DJANGO_DEBUG
parameters.description: If Django is in debug mode

parameters.name: SOLR_SERVICE_NAME
parameters.description: The name of the service associated with the SOLR search engine.

parameters.name: SOLR_CORE_NAME
parameters.description: The name of the core to use when connecting with SOLR.

parameters.name: SKIP_INDEXING_ON_STARTUP
parameters.description: Set this flag to `true` to skip indexing on startup as part of the database migration; set to `all` to skip indexing and suggester build, set to `false` otherwise.  When there are a large number of records to index, indexing at startup can cause startup delays and issues.

parameters.name: ENABLE_REALTIME_INDEXING
parameters.description: Flag to enable/disable realtime search indexing.  Set to 1 to enable, leave it blank to disable.  Having realtime indexing enabled during onboarding can cause performance issues.

parameters.name: ENABLE_SUGGESTER_REBUILD
parameters.description: Flag to enable/disable search suggester rebuilding.  Set to 1 to enable, leave it blank to disable.  Having this enabled can cause issues with very large data-sets.

parameters.name: SOURCE_IMAGE_NAME
parameters.description: The name of the image to use for this resource.

parameters.name: TAG_NAME
parameters.description: The TAG name for this environment, e.g., dev, test, prod

parameters.name: DATABASE_DEPLOYMENT_NAME
parameters.description: The name associated to the database deployment resources.  In particular, this is used to wire up the credentials associated to the database.

parameters.name: THEME
parameters.description: The theme to use for the tob-api.  This defines which customizations to load for the application.

parameters.name: APP_SCRIPT
parameters.description: The start-up script for the application.

parameters.name: RABBITMQ_SVC_NAME
parameters.description: The name of the RabbitMQ service.

parameters.name: AGENT_SERVICE_NAME
parameters.description: Agent service name

parameters.name: AGENT_ADMIN_PORT
parameters.description: Agent admin port

parameters.name: MIN_REPLICAS
parameters.description: The minimum number of pods to have running.

parameters.name: MAX_REPLICAS
parameters.description: The maximum number of pods to have running.

parameters.name: CPU_REQUEST
parameters.description: The resources CPU request (in cores) for this build.

parameters.name: CPU_LIMIT
parameters.description: The resources CPU limit (in cores) for this build.

parameters.name: MEMORY_REQUEST
parameters.description: The resources Memory request (in Mi, Gi, etc) for this build.

parameters.name: MEMORY_LIMIT
parameters.description: The resources Memory limit (in Mi, Gi, etc) for this build.
